```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      include = FALSE)
df.gss = read.csv('data/gss2006.csv')
df.mhealth = read.csv('data/mental_health.csv')
```



# Part 1

## Describe the Data

```{r describe_p1}
ggplot(df.gss, aes(voted04, fill = ifelse(voted04 == 1, 'Voted', 'Did not Vote'))) +
  geom_bar() + 
  labs(title = 'Histogram of Voter Turnout in 2004', x = '', y = 'Number of people') +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = NULL) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title = "Voted in 2004"))
  
```
